tool_description: Historical data for every NCAA Men's Final Four.  Get champions, coaches, records, seeds, final four teams and more in JSON format.
title: NCAA Final Four

api_list.name: Champion
api_list.description: Get championship team data for the given year.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ncaa-final-four.p.rapidapi.com/champion/{identifier}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ncaa-final-four.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Most Outstanding Player
api_list.description: Get the tournament Most Outstanding Player for the given year.  '*' indicates player was not on the championship team.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ncaa-final-four.p.rapidapi.com/mop/{identifier}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ncaa-final-four.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
